item.title: FDA Approves Nerandomilast for Severe Lung Disease
item.description: Tablets for idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis are the first new treatment approved in more than 10 years. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Pregnancy Preference Study Reveals Reproductive Disparities
item.description: Most women who express the desire to avoid pregnancy do so, but differences exist between demographic groups. Medscape Medical News
